search_results.title: Global Faculty Research Profile: Jordan Fenton
search_results.snippet: Dr. Jordan A. Fenton, Assistant Professor of Art History (recently promoted to Associate Professor), is a specialist of African Art History.

search_results.title: Jordan Fenton
search_results.snippet: JORDAN A. FENTON is Associate Professor of Art History at Miami University (Ohio). He has carried out fieldwork in Calabar (Nigeria) since 2008.

search_results.snippet: Jordan A. Fenton, Assistant Professor, Art and Architecture History. Professional Preparation: Ph.D., School of Art and Art History, University of Florida, 2012.
